product_name: MoroccanoilTravel Size Luminous Hairspray Strong Finish
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMoroccanoil Luminous Hairspray Strong Finish is an argan oil-infused, anti-frizz hairspray with moveable but firm hold.
details: DetailsBenefitsFights frizz, repels humidityLeaves no flaky residueImparts a beautiful shineNon-sticky, brushable formulaKey IngredientsArgan Oil: extremely rich in tocopherols (Vitamin E), essential fatty acids and antioxidants, this natural oil helps to nourishItem 2644251How To UseHold can 10 inches (25 cm) from head and spray on dry, styled hair.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50°C (122°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.IngredientsSd Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Va/Crotonates/Vinyl Neodecanoate Copolymer, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Undecane, Tridecane, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Parfum/Fragrance, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Linalyl Acetate, Hexamethylindanopyran, Vanillin. MOLHSUS03Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Hold can 10 inches (25 cm) from head and spray on dry, styled hair.Caution: EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves, or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 50°C (122°F). Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid spraying in eyes. May burst if heated. Protect from sunlight. Avoid fire, flame, and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Lovely smell
reviews.comments: Smells nice and sprays on nicely. Leaves hair soft not sticky or hard.

reviews.headline: Staple in my routine
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoi. I really liked this hairspray it gives a strong hold without making my hair feel stiff or sticky. It adds a nice shine and keeps my style in place all day. Plus, it brushes out easily which I love. Definitely a new staple in my routine!

reviews.headline: Definitely recommend
reviews.comments: This hairspray is AMAZING! I've used it on my styled flat ironed straight hair, as well as styled curls and I am impressed! It smoothed out any flyaways and frizz instantly and kept my hair smooth despite the intense heat and humidity in our area. It also provided the perfect hold on my curls, without looking or feeling crisp! Absolutely recommend! Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Would definitely buy this !!
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil I received a hair spray for all types of hair that works wonderful I really liked how this hair spray and how it leaves my hair with so much volume as well. It is very travel size friendly as well which I loved.

reviews.headline: Such a good hairspray!
reviews.comments: Gifted by moroccanoil - this hairspray is SO good! I love that the smell isn't too overbearing and it doesn't leave my hair feeling crunchy. I love using this for my overnight blowout with the rods and i wake up with soft bouncy hair that smells good

reviews.headline: the best hair spray
reviews.comments: i love all moroccanoil product and i'm so glad i've found a new hair spray to set my hair. i hate having a dry crusty finish on my hair from hair spray but this spray drys down softer with tons of shine. i use it to tame my baby hairs mostly and im obsessed!! Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Great hold
reviews.comments: I have fine hair that is, unfortunately, very wirey in humidity. This hairspray has such a nice hold while not weighing down my hair. I love the super fine mist that helps holds all the strays into place. It's always my final step for the perfect slick-back. Gifted by Moroccanoil.

reviews.headline: Very nice!
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil: this is a very nice hair spray! I really enjoy the scent of it. It adds a nice hold without being too stiff or crunchy. I like the added shine to it as well! Holds up well in the heat and humidity!

reviews.headline: Good for blowouts
reviews.comments: I normally wear my hair naturally curly but this worked great for when I wore my hair straight! Touchable hair with soft hold and gave a nice shine:) This product was gifted by moroccanoil for a review.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I am always looking for hair spray that gives a strong flexible hold. This one checked all of my boxes. My styles last without my hair feeling hard or sticky to the touch. Like other Moroccan oil products this spray smells great! Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: It's good
reviews.comments: Great travel size hairspray! Has nice hold and the mist is pretty fine so it doesn't make my hair super hard or crunchy. It's definitely buildable as well, I'm never too keen on hairspray smells but this one is pretty mild Gifted by moroccanoil

reviews.headline: Strong hold
reviews.comments: Gifted by Moroccanoil Luminous Hairspray Strong (75ml) for free, and I've been so impressed with it. First off, it smells amazing just like the rest of the Moroccanoil line, which makes it feel more like a luxury treat than just a hairspray. The hold is strong enough to keep my style in place all day, but it doesn't leave my hair feeling crunchy or stiff. I can still run my fingers through my hair and it feels soft and touchable, which I really love.

reviews.headline: nice
reviews.comments: I was gifted complimentary from moroccanoil and it's amazing ! It holds my hair in place but doesn't leave it feeling crunchy . the product smells amazing and leaves a nice shine to my hair . would recommend!

reviews.headline: i would buy this!
reviews.comments: Complimentary from moroccanoil i have so enjoyed this hairspray! it gives my hair a great hold, but the added shine makes it look like my hair + not crunchy. i also love the scent on this! if you're looking for a new hairspray that holds try this one!

reviews.headline: Great hairspray
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Moroccan Oil. This is my first time trying a hair spray from them and it did not disappoint. It gave the hold I needed without feeling crunchy or hard. It also didn't weigh down my hair.

reviews.headline: Great for Thin Hair!
reviews.comments: I've used this product for so many years at this point. My cousin is a hair stylist who does bridal hairdos and she uses this! When I used to model for her, she would alwaysss use this product and my hair would look so so nice. Whether you want to have nice beachy waves and have it last all day or have a full on hairdo, this hairspray is great. It doesn't feel like concreate, so my hair is flexible after. Great stuff! 10/10

reviews.headline: I will be repurchasing!
reviews.comments: I absolve this luminous hairspray that Moroccan oil gifted me! I will be repurchasing when I run out! My hair stayed curled all day long which never happens! It also smells so amazing!! I love how lightweight it is!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: It has a great hold and smells amazing! It doesn't leave my hair stiff and works well with my curls. I definitely recommend. I always get compliments when n how good my hair smells. Complimentary from moroccanoil

reviews.headline: YES
reviews.comments: This brand has always had the best smelling products and this hairspray still smells amazing! Doesn't have that strong hairspray smell and isn't crunchy like others. I own a lot of products from them and was excited to be Gifted by moroccanoil!

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: I was Gifted by moroccanoil the Luminous Hairspray in exchange for my honest thoughts on the product…here goes! Now that my hair is in a shorter pixie I've been experimenting more with keeping my waves in place and this product definitely helps! The hold is strong, adds in some bright sheen and smells AMAZING! I would absolutely recommend it!

media.headline: This is an amazing hold spray and a finishing spray
media.caption: Love that it's available in this travel size as well for me to carry on my trips

media.headline: This is an amazing hold spray and a finishing spray
media.caption: It held my hair like that throughout the day

media.headline: strong hold, natural look !
media.caption: I love how shiny my hair looks

rollup.name: Travel Size Luminous Hairspray Strong Finish
